name: Vaccum Sealed Food Storage Container Set, 23 Pieces, 6 Stackable Containers with Lids, Hand Pump and 10 Vacuum Sealable Bags
short_description: Vacuum-Sealed Freshness: FreshSeal containers extend food freshness with vacuum-sealable lids, reducing spoilage and saving you money. 6 Versatile Container Sizes: Includes 6 BPA-free containers in sizes (17.6oz / 0.52L, 27oz / 0.8L, 42.3oz / 1.25L, 67.6oz / 2.0L, 74.4oz / 2.2L, and 121.7oz / 3.6L), ideal for meal prep, leftovers, and pantry storage. Lightweight & Leak-Resistant: Durable plastic construction with leak-resistant lids ensures safe transport and mess-free storage of meals and snacks. Easy-to-Use Hand Vacuum Pump: The included hand pump quickly removes air to create an airtight seal, keeping food fresher for longer. Dishwasher Safe & Space-Saving: Stackable design and dishwasher-safe materials make FreshSeal containers easy to store, clean, and organize in your kitchen.

name: Premium Airtight Food Storage Containers & Vacuum Sealer Machine Starter Set, 4-piece Container with Sealer, 100% Leak Proof,Keep food fresh up to 5 times longer than non-vacuum strorage.
short_description: SET INCLUDES: ONE SET INCLUDE 4 PIECES CONTAINERS AND 1 VACUUM SEALER: 2 Square Containers(3.28qt and 1.48qt), 2 Rectangular Containers(2.11qt and 1.06qt) and Vacuum sealer for container. SMART ONE-CLICK SEAL LID; No hinges. Simply press down the button to lock and lift up the button to open. 100% LEAK-PROOF; The patented double silicone structure ensures optimized storage environment by creating 100% airtightness. VERSATILE & HYGIENIC; Made of high quality BPA Free & food-grade plastic material and eco-friendly purifying treated platinum silicone. They are light, durable, crystal clear and stain & odor resistant. SAFE; VAKUEN airtight food storage containers are safe for microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator and freezer. FULL VACUUM STORAGE; VAKUEN Vacuum Sealer quickly removes the air inside the container in seconds. Vacuum operation automatically stops once it reaches sufficient vacuum state (-25 KPA). It prolongs the lifecycle of food up to 5 times longer than non-vacuum storage containers.

name: Automatic Food Vacuum Sealer Machine | Beelicious Pro 80KPa 8-In-1 Food Vacuum Saver with Starter Kits | 15 Bags, Pulse Function, Moist & Dry Mode and External VAC for Jars and Containers
short_description: 【80kPa Powerful Suction & 8X Freshness】Beelicious Pro 80kPa upgraded powerful vacuum pump provides strong suction, along with advanced sealing technology, keeping your food fresh for up to 8X times longer, protecting your food from freezer burn and saving your money & fridge space. 【8-In-1 Includes Pulse & Ext-Vac & Cutter】Pulse- Manually control the vacuum pressure; Moist & Dry Modes - Maximize freshness for different types of food; Vac Seal- One touch operation; External VAC- for jars, canisters and wine preservation; Build in cutter- Easily customize bag size; Seal- Quick seal only; Stop- Cancel the current process at any time. 【Full Starter Kits Includes Reusable Zipper Bags】Everything you need to start your food-saving journey. Package includes 15 Bags and More: 10xHeat-seal Bags (11"*15.7" x 5pcs, 7.8"*11.8" x 5pcs), 5 x Reusable Vacuum Zipper Bags(9.9"*7.9"), 1 x Extra Gasket Replacement, 1 x External Air Suction Hose, 1 x Vacuum Sealer Machine , 1 x User Manual, 1x AC Power Cord. 【Compact Design & Easy to Clean】15.03"x4.00"x2.44" compact design saves countertop space; 11.8" maximum sealing length allows you to seal multiple bags in one sealing time; Stainless steel and ABS material, easier for you to clean. 【Pro Quality & Warranty】Meet ETL safety standards. Beelicious Pro offers 1-year warranty and technical consultation. Please feel free to contact us and all problems will be solved within 24 working hours.

name: Premium Airtight Food Storage Containers, Mini 9P/SET include Vacuum Sealer, Smart One-Click Seal Lid, No Hinges, 100% Leak Proof, BPA-FREE, Dishwasher, Freezer & Microwave Safe
OXO Good Grips POP Container – Airtight 1.7 Qt for Coffee and More Food Storage, Rectangle, Clear
short_description: OXO Good Grips POP Containers’ airtight, space-efficient design keeps dry foods fresh and your cupboards organized New shapes, sizes and BPA free, dishwasher-safe construction stack perfectly with all POP Containers and can be customized to fit any space Convenient fill line makes it easy to store staples like cereal, flour, sugar, pasta, rice, coffee, nuts and snacks Brand-new line of solution-based accessories easily attach to the underside of POP Container lids. Accessories sold separately Push the button to engage the airtight seal. The button doubles as a handle for the lid. For best results, always use the button to open and close. Do not carry POP Containers by the lid BPA free. Top-rack dishwasher safe.
product_description: Airtight, stackable, space-efficient, and now completely dishwasher safe, OXO Good Grips POP Containers keep dry foods fresh and kitchens organized. New shapes and sizes provide new possibilities for storing everyday must-haves like flour, sugar, coffee, cereal, oatmeal, coffee, grains, pasta and spices. With a handy fill line to guide you, curved corners for smooth dispensing and sturdy, BPA-free construction, these canisters take tidying to the next level. POP Containers aren’t just for kitchens: use them any place you want more organization. OXO expanded the possibilities of POP with a line of eight solution-based accessories that conveniently attach to lids. Accessories sold separately.

name: PressFree TRUE-Auto Vacuum Sealer Machine, Beelicious 85KPA Fully Automatic 8-IN-1 Food Sealer with Bags Storage, Build-in Cutter, Moist Mode and Air Suction Hose | Digital Countdown | Sous Vide
short_description: 【8 Fully Automatic Functions In One】VAC&SEAL: One-Press Easy Operation. DRY & MOIST Mode - Maximize the freshness of different ingredients. SEAL ONLY - Seal food fully automatically. PULSE - Control the vacuum pressure manually. CANISTER & MARINATE - For jars, canisters, wine preservation and marinate. CANCEL- Stop the current operation at any time. 【Pro Features for Easy Operation】 ROLL COMPARTMENT with BUILT-IN CUTTER: Reduce the stress of storing your sealing bags while cutting the right size of bags for your different needs easily. COUNTDOWN DISPLAY: Clear indication of how long it will take to seal. REMOVEABLE TRAY: Easy to pull out for cleaning. 【85KPA Industry-Leading Suction】 Beelicious Vacuum Sealer boasts 120 watts of high power, achieving a rapid vacuum speed of 12 liters/minute. The pure copper core pump ensures corrosion resistance, heat resistance, and friction resistance, delivering an industry-leading suction power of up to 85KPA. 【8X Longer Freshness with Sealing-Tech】 Experience unprecedented freshness with Beelicious Food Freshness Saver. Our upgraded triple-seal assurance features a wider heating tape, robust silicone gaskets, and a 4-layer heating wire, ensuring your food stays fresher for much longer. 【Pro Quality 】 All problems will be solved within 2 working days.
